thread.title: StoryTech Partners with Tesloop to Provide Complimentary Roundtrip Transportation from Los Angeles to Las Vegas for CES 2016 for VIP Tour Registrants
thread.title_full: StoryTech Partners with Tesloop to Provide Complimentary Roundtrip Transportation from Los Angeles to Las Vegas for CES 2016 for VIP Tour Registrants - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: StoryTech Partners with Tesloop to Provide Complimentary Roundtrip Transportation from Los Angeles to Las Vegas for CES 2016 for VIP Tour Registrants
text:
StoryTech and Tesloop partner to Offer Roundtrip luxury rides for VIP Tour Registrants from Los Angeles to CES 2016 in Las Vegas. City-to-City Sustainable Transportation in the World’s Most Advanced Electric Vehicles
Las Vegas, Nevada
StoryTech, official provider of VIP show floor Tours at CES 2016 is partnering with Tesloop provider of sustainable city-to-city transportation to provide free Los Angeles to Las Vegas round trips to VIP Tour registrants.
StoryTech is well known for presenting the technology and forecasting trends at CES in a contextually relevant way to senior executives in storytelling, marketing, brand management, technology and consumer products. The company’s TechLife program is dedicated to keeping clients ahead of the curve.
“We enable our clients to 'ride the trends,'” said Lori H. Schwartz Co-Founder and Managing Partner of StoryTech. “Now they truly can. Tesloop is rolling evidence of 3 key trends-on-demand services, sustainability and the emergence of self-driving/autonomous vehicles. We are thrilled to give VIP tour registrants first hand experience.”
Tesloop is the world’s first sustainable transportation network offering shared city-to-city travel in the Tesla Model S and soon the Model X. The launch route between LA and Las Vegas allows travelers an alternative to the hassles of flying or driving themselves and all at zero emissions. New routes will include LA-San Diego, LA-Palm Springs and Orange County- Palm Springs with other routes across the national in the planning stage.
“Tesloop is excited to partner with StoryTech to introduce this technology and service to industry leaders at CES 2016 and discuss with them how this may positively impact their business operations.”
Only verified StoryTech IMPACT! VIP Tour registrants are eligible for the Tesloop promotions. VIP’s can register at http://www.cesweb.org/showfloortours
About StoryTech
Inform. Innovate. Create. StoryTech® is a revolutionary agency dedicated to informed collaboration between storytellers, including brands, and technology companies resulting in profitable business and content ventures. The company defined and sits at the center of the emerging content ecosystem providing education, production, distribution and engagement strategies. StoryTech’s diverse client base has television production companies and networks, advertising agencies and leading technology companies. http://www.story-tech.com For more information: info(at)story-tech(dot)com
Contact: Brian Seth Hurst 310-684-3823 ext 101 brian(at)story-tech(dot)com
About Tesloop
Tesloop is the world’s first sustainable transportation network. The company’s mission is to offer travelers the most efficient means to access safe, enriching and sustainable city-to-city transportation. Tesloop leverages the confluence of electric vehicles with emerging self-driving features that together will revolutionize highway travel, lifestyles and urban design. http://www.tesloop.com For more information: support(at)tesloop(dot)com
Contact: Rahul Sonnad 424-258-0778 rahulio(at)tesloop(dot)com
